faqs.question: What versions of Blender are currently supported?
faqs.answer:
### Current Supported Versions

|Version|Policy|End Of Life Date/Notes|
|---|---|---|
|4.2 LTS|We currently fully support Blender 4.2 LTS, the current 4.2 dev branch may contain further fixes and updates. All blender 4.2 releases will be released under version number 4.2.x.x. Please ensure your Blender 4.2 is up to date, if you are using an outdated version of Blender 4.2 we may not give support.|Currently set for 3 months after the first stable Avatar Toolkit comes out, this most likely won't be unto Blender 5.0|
|4.4|Cats for Blender 4.4 will be released under version number 4.4.x.x.|Currently set for 1 month after Blender 4.5 comes out.|

history.changes: Removed 4.3 from supported versions, added 4.4 as supported

faqs.question: Which versions are no longer supported (End of Life)?
faqs.answer:
Do not report issues for these versions as they are no longer supported.

|Version|Policy|
|---|---|
|4.3|Cats of Blender 4.3 is now End of Life, no support will be given. All 4.3 versions number will be under 4.3.x.x.|
|3.6 LTS|Cats of Blender 3.6 is now End of Life, no support will be given. All 3.6 versions number will be under 3.6.x.x.|3.6.8.3|
|4.1|Cats of Blender 4.1 is now End of Life, no support will be given. All 4.1 versions number will be under 4.1.x.x.|4.1.2.4|
|4.0|No longer supported, the last version to support this version of blender was [link]https://github.com/Yusarina/Cats-Blender-Plugin-Unofficial-/releases/tag/4.0.5.2|4.0.5.2[/link]|
|3.3, 3.4 and 3.5|No longer supported, the last version to support these versions of blender is [link]https://github.com/Yusarina/Cats-Blender-Plugin-Unofficial-/releases/tag/0.40.0|0.40.0[/link]|
|3.2 and below|No longer supported, the last version to support these versions is [link]https://github.com/Yusarina/Cats-Blender-Plugin-Unofficial-/releases/tag/0.30.0|0.30.0[/link] however this may have issues on 2.8, please use the official version of cats for 2.8.|
|2.79|Even the official cats has not worked on this version of Blender properly for a long time, we do not support this version, please use an older version of the official cats for this version of blender.|

faqs.question: What are the version support policies?
faqs.answer:
When a new LTS comes out, we will make that LTS our main version, all older LTS's will be given a finale date of when we will support it too. For example if Blender 4.2 LTS comes out in June, we will give the 3.6 LTS about 6 month more support and updates so 3.6 would be supported unto November.

[note]Please note dates and how long we support a LTS is not finale.[/note]
